Description: Code linking to a corresponding look-up table.
Maximum surface conductance parameter. Controls the upper limit of stomatal/surface conductance under optimal conditions [mm |s^-1|]
Radiation response parameter. Controls how surface conductance responds to incoming shortwave radiation (Kdown) [W |m^-2|]
Vapour pressure deficit (VPD) response parameter 1. Controls conductance sensitivity to atmospheric dryness [units depend on `gsModel`]
Vapour pressure deficit (VPD) response parameter 2. Additional VPD sensitivity parameter for non-linear responses [units depend on `gsModel`]
Temperature response parameter. Controls how surface conductance responds to air temperature changes [°C]
Soil moisture response parameter. Controls conductance sensitivity to soil water availability [|mm^-1|]
A parameter related to soil moisture dependence [-]
A parameter related to soil moisture dependence [mm]
